title: Penalty for contravention of sections 355 to358.
content: 359. Any person who is knowingly responsible for the issue, circulation or distribution of a prospectus, or for the issue of a form of application for shares or debentures, in contravention of any of the provisions of sections 355 to 358 shall be liable to imprisonment not exceeding two years or to a fine not exceeding two thousand, five hundred and sixty-two euros or to both such imprisonment and fine. Civil liability for misstatements in prospectus.
